entry.title: What is 710 Day?
entry.summary: Within cannabis culture, 710 Day is basically International Dab Day according to Urban Dictionary. 710 is considered a holiday celebrated on July 10th for many cannabis consumers that enjoy cannabis oil products like dabs or concentrates. The term 710 rotated and upside down spells OIL, a word used to describe these highly potent cannabis products. [...]
